intro: Rhodiola sinuata, commonly known as the sinuous rhodiola, is a perennial flowering plant native to the high-altitude regions of Central Asia. Rhodiola sinuata is also valued for its potential medicinal properties, though further research is needed to confirm its therapeutic uses.
